```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require(rgdal)
require(leaflet)
require(leaflet.extras)
require(dplyr)
require(readxl)
require(stringr)
```

# Getting Spatial Data

```{r}
soil.load <- readOGR("./Allegheny_County_Soil_Type_Areas/Allegheny_County_Soil_Type_Areas.shp", layer = "Allegheny_County_Soil_Type_Areas")
plot(soil.load)
summary(soil.load)
```

# Blank map with basemap

```{r}
leaflet(data = soil.load) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Thunderforest.Landscape,options = providerTileOptions(noWrap = TRUE))%>%
  addPolygons() %>%
  addPolylines(color = "#63CBD3")
  # addPolylines(color = "#63CBD3")
```

# Shape

```{r}
leaflet(data = soil.load) %>%
  addProviderTiles("Stamen.Toner") %>%
  
  addPolylines(color = "#63CBD3")

# Lines

```{r}
rivers <- readOGR("./ne_10m_rivers_lake_centerlines")

leaflet(data = rivers) %>%
  addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldTerrain", options = providerTileOptions(noWrap = TRUE)) %>%
  addPolylines(color = "#63CBD3")
